name: firefox-workspaces
description: Create named workspaces that open as dedicated browser windows, auto-save their tab sets, and sync across devices.

scripts.build: powershell -Command "Remove-Item workspaces.xpi -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Compress-Archive -Path manifest.json, background.js, shared, popup, options, sidebar, icons, README.md, PRIVACY.md -DestinationPath workspaces.zip -Force; Rename-Item workspaces.zip workspaces.xpi"
scripts.build:unix: rm -f workspaces.xpi && zip -r workspaces.xpi manifest.json background.js shared/ popup/ options/ sidebar/ icons/ README.md PRIVACY.md

author: Personal Use
